notifyChanged().Description: Invokes @B_android#database#DataSetObserver#onChanged_E@ on each observer. Called when the contents of the data set have changed. The recipient will obtain the new contents the next time it queries the data set.

notifyInvalidated().Description: Invokes @B_android#database#DataSetObserver#onInvalidated_E@ on each observer. Called when the data set is no longer valid and cannot be queried again, such as when the data set has been closed.

ClassDesc: A specialization of @B_android#database#Observable_E@ for @B_android#database#DataSetObserver_E@ that provides methods for sending notifications to a list of @B_android#database#DataSetObserver_E@ objects.
